name: Titan's Grip
description: While Raging, you can wield Two-Handed weapons using only one hand.

name: Quick to Anger
description: When you roll Initiative, you can spend 1 SP to immediately.

name: Not Down Yet
description: Once per Long Rest, the first time you are reduced to 0 or fewer Hit Points, you gain a a number of Temp HP equal to your Prime Attribute. These Temp HP are added before the any damage reaches your Vitality.

name: Missed Me
description: Once per Long Rest, the first time your Vitality would be reduced by any source of damage, the damage is reduced by a number equal to your Prime Attribute.

name: Mind your Business
description: You have ADV on Saves against the Charmed condition.
